heading: HR00888
0: RESOLUTION EARNESTLY RECOMMENDING TO THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) TO IMMEDIATELY IMPLEMENT MEASURES TO ADDRESS THE SLACK IN TECHNICAL MANPOWER IN THE REGIONS THEREBY ESTABLISHING A REGIONAL ENGINEERING GROUP CAPABLE OF EXECUTING PLANS AND DESIGNS OF PROPOSED PROJECTS FOR THE PROVINCE/DISTRICT/CITY OR MUNICIPALITY

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EARNESTLY RECOMMENDING TO THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) TO IMMEDIATELY IMPLEMENT MEASURES TO ADDRESS THE SLACK IN TECHNICAL MANPOWER IN THE REGIONS THEREBY ESTABLISHING A REGIONAL ENGINEERING GROUP CAPABLE OF EXECUTING PLANS AND DESIGNS OF PROPOSED PROJECTS FOR THE PROVINCE/DISTRICT/CITY OR MUNICIPALITY
